meanings.definition: The part of a rifle or shotgun that rests against the shoulder.
meanings.sent1: The hunter adjusted the buttstocks of his rifle before taking aim at the target.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to properly shoulder the buttstocks of the shotgun for better accuracy.
meanings.sent3: When the soldier's buttstocks accidentally hit his friend's shoulder, they both burst into laughter.
meanings.sent4: The weight of the world felt like the pressure of a thousand buttstocks against his shoulder.
meanings.sent5: The smooth wood of the buttstocks felt comforting against her cheek as she lined up her shot.

meanings.definition: A stock of a gun that is attached to the rear end of the receiver.
meanings.sent1: He carefully cleaned the buttstocks of his gun after a long day at the shooting range.
meanings.sent2: The buttstocks of the rifle were made of durable material to withstand rough handling.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy robber tripped over his own feet, causing the buttstocks of his gun to hit the ground.
meanings.sent4: The buttstocks of the old shotgun held memories of countless hunting trips in the woods.
meanings.sent5: As he held the gun, the buttstocks felt like an extension of his own arm, steady and reliable.
